Lazy Thoughts

N'oluyo Kafakafaya

08 Apr 2016

Keeping with the videos..

Here’s Kafakafaya (translates to head to head) in N’oluyo. It’s a bracket based quiz, where we start with 16 characters and keep picking until we have a winner. Implementing the result screen actually took much longer than implementing the game screen + game logic.

Why I Love Swift

14 Jan 2016

Because.

This would take a lot more lines in Objective-C, and be less clear.

Here’s the extension for it:

extension Array {
    func partitionBy(predicate: (Element -> Bool)) -> ([Element], [Element]) {
        var left = [Element]()
        var right = [Element]()
        
        for elem in self {
            if predicate(elem) {
                left.append(elem)
            } else {
                right.append(elem)
            }
        }
        
        return (left, right)
    }
  }
